physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#137, Donor Dr. Ed. Silverberg, B'nai B'rith Membership Drive 1939, From L to R Col. Al Hirschfeld, Capt W. Capilo, Capt. S. Jacobs, Dr. Silverberg, Capt. S. Schwartz, Capt L. Ginsberg, Col. Sam Schafer, membership for Jewish War Veterans (?).'' Handwritten on front of photograph: ''B.B. Membership Drive Nov. 1939, Col. Al. Hirschfeld, Capt. W. Capilo, Capt. S. Jacobs, Dr. Silverberg Chairman, Capt. S. Schwartz, Capt. L. Ginsberg, Col. Sam Schafer.''

mods.abstract: Left to right: Col. Al Hirschfeld, Capt. W. Capilo, Capt. S. Jacobs, Dr. Ed Silverberg, Capt. S. Schwartz, Capt L. Ginsberg, and Col. Sam Schafer pose together in a hallway during a B'nai B'rith membership drive.
